body: Unit test  was added

Hi @marker-wu 
If your question is solved, we will close this issue.

Hi @xue2lang 
Why not tell us the version you are using first, and see if any one in the community have similar situations and can answer your questions?

Hi @wujiandong 
What is the compilation command you use?

Hi @jingminy 
If your problem is solved, can you close this issue?
Maybe download failed in your local

Due to the adjustment of the examples structure (#12557), example for autoTable should not be added to the other-example module.
The new location should be under `shardingsphere-jdbc-example/single-feature-example/sharding-example`, just add a new autoTable configuration example for each sub module.

Verification:
```
mysql> create database logic_db;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.01 sec)

mysql> show databases;
+-------------+
| schema_name |
+-------------+
| sharding_db |
| shard1      |
| logic_db    |
+-------------+
3 rows in set (0.00 sec)
```

`logic_db` has empty `dataSources` and `rules`.

Set breakpoint on `FrontDatabaseProtocolTypeFactory.getDatabaseType()`, restart proxy, `ProxyContext.getInstance().getContextManager().getMetaDataContexts().getAllSchemaNames()` return `0 = "logic_db"
1 = "sharding_db"
2 = "shard1"`.

`ProxyContext.getInstance().getContextManager().getMetaDataContexts().getAllSchemaNames().iterator().next()` will return `"logic_db"`. Since `dataSources` is empty, then default database MySQL (`DatabaseTypeRegistry.DEFAULT_DATABASE_TYPE = "MySQL"`) will be used.
If current testing database type is not MySQL, then connect to proxy will be failed.

Since `getAllSchemaNames()` return `HashMap`, the first element depends on contents.

It doesn't matter, you can take some time to learn. If it really can't be done, we can let someone else do it.
No matter what, thank you very much!
